objects.name: Controls
objects.string:
Welcome to the prototype of BrassHell
This is a Bullet Hell game
You take damage when your COCKPIT
   is hit, and you have 1 second of 
   invincibility when damaged

Arrow keys: Move
Space: Special Attack
Hold Shift: Move Slower
Escape: Pause/Unpause 
Hold R: Restart
==Cheats==
1,2,3,4,5: set level respectively
6: infinite hp

objects.name: PauseScreen
objects.string:
PAUSED

Arrow keys: Move
Space: Special Attack
Hold Shift: Move Slower
Escape: Pause/Unpause 
Hold R: Restart

==Cheats==
1,2,3,4,5: set level respectively
6: infinite hp

events.comment:
Shoot and specials
(Note: Player animation 1 (when shield is active) is slightly wider than animation 0, so the bullet x position must be adjusted by a few pixels)

parameters:
"You have defeated the boss
 and completed the level!
(this is all the prototype
 content currently available)"

"You have defeated the boss and completed the level
(this is all the prototype content currently)"

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time, so that it is alternately visible and invisible.
After adding this to an object, you have to **trigger the effect** by using the **Flash action**.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Flash
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription:
Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time, so that it is alternately visible and invisible.
Trigger the effect by using the Flash action.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time, so that it is alternately visible and invisible.
Trigger the effect by using the Flash action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Flash

eventsFunctions.description: Make the specified object(s) blink for the given duration.
eventsFunctions.name: Flash

parameters.description: Duration of the blinking, in seconds
parameters.name: FlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the specified objects are flashing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

eventsFunctions.description: Stop the flashing of the specified object
eventsFunctions.name: Stop

propertyDescriptors.label: Half period (time during which object is invisible), in seconds
propertyDescriptors.name: HalfPeriodTime

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: StayOnScreen
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Force the object to stay visible on the screen by setting back its position inside the viewport of the camera.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: StayOnScreen

parameters: min(max(Object.X(), CameraX(Object.Layer(), 0) - CameraWidth(Object.Layer(), 0)/2 + Object.Behavior::PropertyMarginLeft()), CameraX(Object.Layer(), 0) + CameraWidth(Object.Layer(), 0)/2 - Object.Behavior::PropertyMarginRight())

min(max(Object.Y(), CameraY(Object.Layer(), 0) - CameraHeight(Object.Layer(), 0)/2+ Object.Behavior::PropertyMarginTop()), CameraY(Object.Layer(), 0) + CameraHeight(Object.Layer(), 0)/2- Object.Behavior::PropertyMarginBottom())

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: FireBullet
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FireBullet

eventsFunctions.description: Fire a bullet toward a position
eventsFunctions.fullName: Fire a bullet toward a position
eventsFunctions.name: FireTowardPosition
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_;_PARAM3_, toward position _PARAM5_;_PARAM6_ with speed _PARAM7_ px/s

parameters.description: X position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: XPosition

parameters.description: Y position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: YPosition

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
parameters.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.name: Fire
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM4_ from _PARAM0_, at position _PARAM2_;_PARAM3_, with angle _PARAM5_ and speed _PARAM6_ px/s

parameters.description: X position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: XPosition

parameters.description: Y position, where to create the bullet
parameters.name: YPosition

parameters.description: Angle of the bullet, in degrees
parameters.name: Angle

parameters.description: Speed of the bullet, in pixels per second
parameters.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object has just fired something.
eventsFunctions.name: HasJustFired

propertyDescriptors.label: Cooldown, in seconds, before firing again
propertyDescriptors.name: FireCooldown

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Add actions and conditions to manage the life of the object. Object can get damages, lose some health and you can check with a condition if it's dead.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Health (life points and damages for objects)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Health
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Add actions and conditions to manage the life of the object. Object can get damages, lose some health and you can check with a condition if it's dead.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Add actions and conditions to manage the life of the object. Object can get damages, lose some health and you can check with a condition if it's dead.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Health

eventsFunctions.description: Add some damage to the object, decreasing its life.
eventsFunctions.name: Hit

parameters.description: Value of the damage to do (will be removed from object health)
parameters.name: DamageValue

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object is considered dead (no more health)
eventsFunctions.name: IsDead

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the object was just damaged previously in the events.
eventsFunctions.name: IsJustDamaged

eventsFunctions.description: Heal the object, incrasing its life.
eventsFunctions.name: Heal

parameters.description: How much to heal (will be added to object health)
parameters.name: HealValue

eventsFunctions.description: Change the object health to set it to a specific value (check if the actions to damage or heal the object are not better suited to your use case before using this one).
eventsFunctions.name: SetHealth

propertyDescriptors.label: Damage cooldown (in seconds) (0 for no cooldown)
propertyDescriptors.name: DamageCooldown

eventsFunctions.description: Move according to the properties of the enemy. should be called every frame
eventsFunctions.name: Move

propertyDescriptors.label: Time for a full wiggle in seconds
propertyDescriptors.name: WiggleTimer
